response.body: {"data":[{"aliases":["小林家的妹抖龙","小林家的龙女仆","The maid dragon of Kobayashi-san","Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon"],"banner":"/banners/graphical/318893-g.jpg","firstAired":"2017-1-12","id":318893,"image":"/banners/posters/318893-2.jpg","network":"Tokyo MX","overview":"Kobayashi lives alone in an apartment, until one day, Tohru appeared and they ended up living together. Tohru looks down on humans as inferior and foolish, but having been saved by Kobayashi-san, she does everything she can to repay the debt and help her with various things, although not everything goes according to plan.\r\n\r\nA mythical everyday life comedy about a hard working office lady living with a dragon girl.","poster":"/banners/posters/318893-2.jpg","seriesName":"Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid","slug":"miss-kobayashis-dragon-maid","status":"Continuing"}]}
